TEST.0.title: 2023 North Carolina Division B Regional 4
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.268.cipherString: There is real magic in enthusiasm. It spells the difference between mediocrity and accomplishment.
CIPHER.268.question: A quote from Norman Vincent Peale has been encoded as an Aristocrat, what does it say? When you have solved it, raise your hand so that the time can be recorded and the solution checked.

CIPHER.288.cipherString: To write well, express yourself like the common people, but think like a wise man.
CIPHER.288.question: Solve this quote from Aristotle which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.272.cipherString: Every blade of grass is a study; and to produce two, where there was but one, is both a profit and a pleasure.
CIPHER.272.question: Decode a quote by Abraham Lincoln that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K2 alphabet. You are told that it starts with EVERY.

CIPHER.285.cipherString: Science is about applying what we know and asking what we don't know.
CIPHER.285.question: The following quote by Tim Hunt needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of LUNAR

CIPHER.280.cipherString: The smaller the creature, the bolder its spirit.
CIPHER.280.question: A quote by Suzy Kassem has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 8=●, 6=–, 3=×, 0=–, 9=●, 5=×

CIPHER.274.cipherString: I do like alternative rock and rap, but as far as inspirational, then I go full-on orchestra. It fills up your entire being.
CIPHER.274.question: A famous phrase from Osric Chau has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K1 alphabet. You are told that DVCED maps to TRAIT.

CIPHER.282.cipherString: Math is my Passion. Engineering is my Profession.
CIPHER.282.question: A quote by Wilfred James Dolor has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 9=×●, 6=●×, 2=––, 5=–●, 8=●–, 1=×–

CIPHER.269.cipherString: A minute of perfection was worth the effort. A moment was the most you could ever expect from perfection.
CIPHER.269.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Chuck Palahniuk which has the word PERFECTION in it.

CIPHER.292.cipherString: You want to climb the mountain because it's there and you know you can do it.
CIPHER.292.question: A quote by Alex Zanardi has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 3 and 5 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.279.cipherString: Think before you speak. Read before you think.
CIPHER.279.question: A quote by Langston Hughes has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 9=●, 6=×, 3=×, 2=–, 5=×

CIPHER.278.cipherString: He vivido para saber que el secreto de la felicidad es nunca permitir que tus energías se estanquen.
CIPHER.278.question: Solve this Xenocrypt which is a translation of a quote by Adam Clarke into Spanish and has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.  You are told it ends with the letters QUEN.
CIPHER.278.translation: I have lived to know that the secret of happiness is never to allow your energies to stagnate.

CIPHER.273.cipherString: Hapliness will grow if ewe plant teh seeds of luv in teh garden of hope with compassoin and kare.
CIPHER.273.question: Your friend offered you some advice in the form of a Cryptogram, but they are a terrible speller. You are told it contains the word SEEDS.

CIPHER.284.question: After solving the cryptarithm PLANE-FORM=UFO decode the phrase 5847620 9026781.

CIPHER.270.cipherString: Victories that are easy are cheap. Those only are worth having which come as the result of hard fighting.
CIPHER.270.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Henry Ward Beecher which has the word THAT in it.

CIPHER.290.cipherString: Knowledge is power as well as fame.
CIPHER.290.question: The following quote by RUFUS CHOATE needs to be encoded with the Affine Cipher using a=9 and b=11.

CIPHER.275.cipherString: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
CIPHER.275.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Vince Lombardi using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?

CIPHER.271.cipherString: Time is the single most important resource that we have. Every single minute we lose is never coming back.
CIPHER.271.question: Decode a quote by Tarun Sharma that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K1 alphabet. You are told that the word MINUTE occurs once.

CIPHER.281.cipherString: Discontent is the first necessity of progress.
CIPHER.281.question: A quote by Thomas Edison has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 4=×●, 2=●×, 5=×–, 9=–●, 8=●●

CIPHER.289.cipherString: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
CIPHER.289.question: Encode this quote by Patrick Ness using the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.277.cipherString: The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
CIPHER.277.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Nicolas Chamfort using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text ends with HTER

CIPHER.283.cipherString: A little rebellion now and then is a good thing.
CIPHER.283.question: A quote by Thomas Jefferson has been encoded using the FractionatedMorse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with A LITTLE R.

CIPHER.291.cipherString: All of science is nothing more than the refinement of everyday thinking.
CIPHER.291.question: Decode a quote by Albert Einstein that has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher. You are told that between 3 and 5 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.287.cipherString: The card-player begins by arranging his hand for maximum sense. Scientists do the same with the facts they gather.
CIPHER.287.question: Solve this quote from Isaac Asimov which has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher.

CIPHER.286.cipherString: There are always sides. There is always a winner, and a loser. For every person who gets, there's someone who must give.
CIPHER.286.question: A quote from Jodi Picoult has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher. What does it say?

CIPHER.276.cipherString: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
CIPHER.276.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Aesop using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?
